text:
I went to the clinic twice and both nurses that attended to me was very professional, friendly and helpful.
The second doctor (Dr Natalie Lee) that attended to me for my follow up appointment was really meticulous and went the extra mile to make sure I was okay. I was really touched by her care and professionalism.

Dr. Natalie provided exceptional care for my daughter during her visit. She treated her with kindness and gave us the time we needed, ensuring we felt comfortable and informed throughout the process. Her expertise was evident, especially during the blood test, where she handled everything with precision and care.
Thank you, Dr. Natalie, for your excellent care and dedication to your patients' well-being.
The receptionist and the doctor were both warm and friendly. I felt comfortable and welcome even though it was my first time visiting the clinic.
Clinic has smaller space as compare to last time. Dr Lee is friendly and made me feel comfortable during the visit. Thanks.

Simple no frills health checkup. For $200 you get blood test with cancer markers. Most other chains cost $300 and above. There's only two staff in the clinic but they are friendly and professional. Book appointment online.
